definition[0]: the inside surface of your hand, in which you hold things
example[0]: He held the pebble in the palm of his hand.
example[1]: She looked at the coins in her palm.
definition[1]: a tropical tree which grows near beaches or in deserts, with a long straight trunk and large pointed leaves at the top
definition[2]: to hide something in the palm of your hand, especially when you are performing a magic trick or stealing something
